sentence.Network_en: Here, graphically displayed, was confirmation of the entire story.
sentence.Network_cn: 通过这里形象的展示证实了整件事的真实性。

sentence.Network_en: It was announced that the times were provisional and subject to confirmation.
sentence.Network_cn: 已宣布说这些时间是暂定的，还有待确定。

sentence.Network_en: They took her resignation from Bendix as confirmation of their suspicions.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们认为她从本迪克斯公司辞职证实了他们的怀疑。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: via Old French from Latin confirmatio(n-), from confirmare 'make firm, establish' (see confirm)

entry.def: If something confirms what you believe, suspect, or fear, it shows that it is definitely true.

example.ex: X-rays have confirmed that he has not broken any bones...
These new statistics confirm our worst fears about the depth of the recession...
example.tran: 这些新的统计数据证实经济衰退已经严重到我们最为担忧的境地。

entry.def: If you confirm something that has been stated or suggested, you say that it is true because you know about it.

example.ex: The spokesman confirmed that the area was now in rebel hands...
example.tran: 这位发言人证实该地区现已落入叛乱分子手中。

example.ex: He confirmed what had long been feared...
example.tran: 他证实了人们长期以来的担心。

entry.tran: (通常指通过信件或电话)确定，确认(安排或预约)
entry.def: If you confirm an arrangement or appointment, you say that it is definite, usually in a letter or on the telephone.

example.ex: You make the reservation, and I'll confirm it in writing.
example.tran: 你来预订，我会去函确认。

entry.tran: 为…施坚振礼（或坚信礼）(从而正式成为基督教会的成员)
entry.def: If someone is confirmed, they are formally accepted as a member of a Christian church during a ceremony in which they say they believe what the church teaches.

example.ex: He was confirmed as a member of the Church of England.
example.tran: 他领受了坚振礼，成为英国国教会的一员。

entry.tran: 使坚定，使确信(自己的决定、信仰或观点)
entry.def: If something confirms you in your decision, belief, or opinion, it makes you think that you are definitely right.

example.ex: It has confirmed me in my decision not to become a nun.
example.tran: 这使我更加坚定了不做修女的决心。

entry.tran: 加强，巩固(地位、角色或权力)
entry.def: If someone confirms their position, role, or power, they do something to make their power, position, or role stronger or more definite.

example.ex: Williams has confirmed his position as the world's number one snooker player.
example.tran: 威廉姆斯巩固了自己世界头号斯诺克选手的地位。

entry.tran: 巩固，确保(某人的名声、角色或地位)
entry.def: If something confirms you as something, it shows that you definitely deserve a name, role, or position.

example.ex: His new role could confirm him as one of our leading actors.
example.tran: 他的新角色会确保他跻身我们的一流演员之列。

means.word_mean: 1. additional proof that something that was believed (some fact or hypothesis or theory) is correct;

sentences.sentence: "fossils provided further confirmation of the evolutionary theory"

means.word_mean: 3. making something valid by formally ratifying or confirming it;
4. a ceremony held in the synagogue (usually at Pentecost) to admit as adult members of the Jewish community young men and women who have successfully completed a course of study in Judaism
5. a sacrament admitting a baptized person to full participation in the church

auth_sentence.res_content: There was no government confirmation of the rebel claim.

auth_sentence.content: The nomination is subject to confirmation by the Senate.
auth_sentence.res_content: The nomination is subject to confirmation by the Senate.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The nomination is subject to confirmation by the Senate.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表名词,"行为,过程,结果"; 2. 注：如果加在y结尾的单词后通常为去掉y加上ication.

stems_affixes.word_buile: revoc=revoke废除+ation行为,过程,结果→n.废弃,取消

stems_affixes.value_cn: 结合,联合;化合;团体;组合数码
stems_affixes.word_buile: combine联合+ation行为,过程,结果→n.结合,联合;化合;团体;组合数码
confirm证实+ation行为,过程,结果→n.证实,确定;确认
determine决心+ation行为,过程,结果→n.决心;决定;确定
excite使兴奋+ation行为,过程,结果→n.刺激;激动;激发
exclaim叫喊;感叹+ation行为,过程,结果→n.叫喊;感叹
ex出去+plan明白+ation行为,过程,结果→使其明白→解释,解说
generalize一般的+ation行为,过程,结果→n.一般化;概括,综合

stems_affixes.value_cn: 想象[力];空想,幻觉;想象出来的事物
stems_affixes.word_buile: imagine设想+ation行为,过程,结果→n.想象[力];空想,幻觉;想象出来的事物

stems_affixes.value_cn: 倾斜,弯曲,倾度,倾向,爱好
stems_affixes.word_buile: incline倾斜;偏向+ation行为,过程,结果→n.倾斜,弯曲,倾度,倾向,爱好
lament悲伤,哀悼+ation行为,过程,结果→n.悲痛,哀悼,痛哭
limit限制+ation行为,过程,结果→n.限制,局限性
oblige迫使,责成+ation行为,过程,结果→n.义务,责任
present赠送+ation行为,过程,结果→n.介绍;赠送;呈现
provoc=provoke激怒+ation行为,过程,结果→n.激怒
recommend赞扬;推荐+ation行为,过程,结果→n.推荐,介绍[信],劝告,建议
represent描述,表示+ation行为,过程,结果→n.描写;陈述;代表

stems_affixes.value_cn: 保留,保留意见;预定,预订
stems_affixes.word_buile: reserve保留,储备;预定+ation行为,过程,结果→reservation保留
starve使饿死+ation行为,过程,结果→n.饥饿

sentences.en: The police are seeking independent confirmation of certain details of the story.
sentences.cn: 警方正在寻找案件某些细节的独立证据。

sentences.en: We need confirmation in writing before we can send your order out.
sentences.cn: 给你们发送订购的货物之前，我们需要书面确认。

sentences.en: Written confirmation came three days later.
sentences.cn: 三天后获得了书面确认。
